snippet: In targeting debts that were decades old in some cases, the Treasury had been intercepting the tax refunds of the recipients’ children.
abstract: Social Security Administration says it will stop trying to collect taxpayers' debts that are more than 10 years old.
lead_paragraph: In targeting debts that were decades old in some cases, the Treasury had been intercepting the tax refunds of the recipients’ children.

headline.main: U.S. Halts Effort to Collect Old Social Security Debts
headline.print_headline: U.S. Halts Effort to Collect Old Social Security Debts
